DOC.brief_summary: The investigators wish to determine if application of 2% lidocaine soaked gauze to the peritonsillar pillars will decrease the amount of gagging caused by awake videolaryngocope assisted tracheal intubation in the morbidly obese.
DOC.brief_title: Glossopharyngeal Nerve Blockade for Awake Videolaryngoscope Assisted Endotracheal Intubation in the Morbidly Obese
DOC.criteria: morbid obese patients scheduled for bariatric surgery, with a planned awake intubation. inability to communicate in English or french allergies to any study drugs any patient with an American society of anesthesiologists score of 4 or more
